NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Renewables and Prices or the cell corresponding to Electricity and Reliability?

Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Water and Consumption or the cell corresponding to Renewables and Storage?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Renewables} and {Storage} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Distribution and Prices or the cell corresponding to Exploration and Reliability?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Exploration} and {Reliability} has a higher heat value.
